definition: to send/to mail/to entrust/to depend on/to attach oneself to/to live (in a house)/to lodge/foster (son etc)
to hand over/to pass on sth/to gradually increase or decrease/progressively

sentences.english: The post office has made early preparation for the delivering of this year's letters of college admission.
sentences.chinese: 郵局對今年高考錄取通知書的寄遞工作提前做了準備。

sentences.english: The documents shall not be forwarded by air route unless the contract of sail so provides.
sentences.chinese: 除買賣合同有規定外，單據不用航空寄遞。
